title: Tsaritsa Mains
description:
Welcome to the realm of Her Majesty Tsaritsa! Join us and be part of the Fatui and a citizen of Snezhnaya. Now that the Fatui is on your side, rest assured, good times await. 

As followers of Raiden, surely you too must have realised the errors of the Divine. With the Archon of Eternity and you on our side, let us rebel together against the Divine. Your dedication and worthiness will be rewarded by the Tsaritsa herself and open the  doorways to peace and love.
